title: Dragonforce - Maximum Overload (Bonus Track) mp3 320k ak6103
description:
Dragonforce - Maximum Overload (Bonus Track) mp3 320k ak6103 What we got ...
On 12 April 2013, the band announced that writing for a follow-up to The Power Within had been completed, and that the band would be entering the studio in May. On 19 May 2013, DragonForce entered Fascination Street Studios in Sweden with Jens Bogren as the producer of DragonForce's sixth album. On 31 March 2014, it was revealed that the new album would be titled Maximum Overload, and that Trivium's Matt Heafy would make some guest appearances on the album. It was also revealed that the album would contain a cover of the Johnny Cash song "Ring of Fire". The album will be released in the UK on 18 August 2014, and in the US on 19 August 2014.On the same day, a song from the album, titled "Defenders", was uploaded onto DragonForce's official YouTube channel. On 3 June 2014, DragonForce announced that they had parted ways with Mackintosh and had replaced him with former Braindamage and Kill Ritual drummer Gee Anzalone. Maximum Overload will be the final album to feature Mackintosh on drums. On 18 June, the band released the track listing for the album, and on the same day, they released the music video for the first song on the album, titled "The Game". On 17 July the band released the official version of the song "Defenders" on itunes.
